description: Numbers n such that 101^n-100 is prime.
comments: Related to hyperperfect numbers of a certain form.101^623-100, a 1249-digit number, has been certified prime with Primo. - _Rick L. Shepherd_, Jun 21 2002
links: J. S. McCranie, A study of hyperperfect numbers, J. Int. Seqs. Vol. 3 (2000) #P00.1.3.
author: _Jud McCranie_
extensions: Edited and extended by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 18 2002
